It's the old GTA3. GTA LCS didn't come out for PC.

Brilliant Torrent, downloads very quickly, and once downloaded its easy to run. The game also works fine apart from the radio but im not too bothered about that. GREAT TORRENT!

Oh and by the way if ya stuck on running it here is what 2 do:

First open the setup, let it install
second do not put it on desktop it dont work.
third after its installed just click the gta3 logo with the picture.

There ya go enjoy the game

The game works perfectly, those who is woundering about the radio... you need the real GTA 3 CD to listen to the music coz its not installed with the game, it plays the songs from the CD
